column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S in Madison Co:
column4: Roadway reportedly shutdown at the 95 MM (Boonesborough/Winchester exit) due to a multi-vehicle collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S in Madison Co:
column4: Traffic backed up to the 103 MM in Fayette Co.  Significant delays also on US-25S in Madison Co.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S in Madison Co:
column4: UPDATE 4:07 p.m. - All lanes of I-75S at 95 MM in Madison Co are now open.  Expect continued delays on the interstate and US-25S while traffic flow returns to normal.
